definitions.definition: That which belongs to you (singular); the possessive second-person singular pronoun used without a following noun.
definitions.example: If this edit is mine, the other must be yours.  Their encyclopedia is good, but yours is even better.  It’s all yours.

definitions.definition: That which belongs to you (plural); the possessive second-person plural pronoun used without a following noun.
Written at the end of a letter, before the signature.
definitions.example: Yours sincerely,  Yours faithfully,  Yours,  Sincerely yours,
